title: PMS 2.0 507 - Thursday Night Football Recap, NFL Week 4 Preview, Joel Bitonio, Ian Rapoport, Coach Jason Brown, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys chat about last night's Thursday Night Football game between the Jags and Bengals, the same game parlay fell just short, Urban Meyer being heartbroken after the game despite the Jags looking much better than they have thus far, plus Pat and AJ Hawk go through the entire week 4 NFL slate and choose each game against the spread (55:32-1:15:28). Joining the show for his weekly wrap up is NFL Network Insider Ian Rapoport. Pat and Rapsheet chat about this weekend's game between the Bucs and Patriots and what the buzz around the league is, if the Deshaun Watson situation has heated up at all around the league, what big names are on the injury report going into this weekend, and more (29:15-55:28). Later, 3x Pro Bowler, 3x All-Pro, Guard for the Cleveland Browns, Joel Bitonio joins Pat and AJ Hawk to chat about Cleveland's resurgence, what it's like winning games after losing a lot early in his career, the different personalities in the locker room, what his play style is like, how legendary his dad was, and how long it took to acclimate to the weather in Cleveland as a California kid (1:15:30-1:28:25). Lastly, joining the show for his weekly appearance, is the star from seasons 3 and 4 of Last Chance U, Coach Jason Brown. Pat and Coach JB chat about what has been pissing him off as of late, his issues with ESPN personalities and what they say on the air, who he likes this weekend pick wise, and why he thinks Nick Saban is Nick Saban because Pete Carroll is in the NFL (1:29:57-1:50:14). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
